Show / Hide Table of Contents

Class VectorHelper

This class is designed to help facilitate the use of the SIMD instructions available in modern .Net.

Inheritance
System.Object
VectorHelper
Inherited Members

Exp(Single[], Int32, Single[], Int32, Int32)

Applies exp(x) for each element in the array

Declaration
public static void Exp(float[] destination, int destIndex, float[] x, int xIndex, int length)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.Single[] destination

Where to save the results.
System.Int32 destIndex

An offset into the array to start saving.
System.Single[] x

The vector to use as the exponent.
System.Int32 xIndex

The offset into the exponent vector to start from.
System.Int32 length

The number of elements to convert.
Remarks

The series is unrolled 30 times which approximates the .Net implementation from System.Math.Exp
